TitleEnglish: She Professed Herself Pupil of the Wise Man
SummaryEnglish: Sakamori Kagami was one of the top players in the VRMMO Ark Earth Online as Danblf, a veteran summoner with the gravitas to match his elite status. When he falls asleep playing one day, he's transported to a world where the game is reality—but instead of his all-powerful avatar, he's stuck in the body of a cute young girl! He can't let anyone know that this little cutie is really Danblf, so he takes the name “Mira” and claims to be Danblf's disciple. If this gets out, he'll never live it down!
Aliases: Kenja no Deshi wo Nanoru Kenja
Kenja no Deshi o Nanoru Kenja

1.SummaryEnglish: Ark Earth Online is a revolutionary VRMMORPG that gives players total freedom. Solomon became a king and Danblf became a renown wizard. Both enjoyed the immersive roleplaying until one day, everything changed.

2.SummaryEnglish: Danblf finds himself unable to log out of the game and stuck, not in his old wizen body, but in the body of a platinum blonde girl. Now, he must find a way to make it work and help his friend Solomon.

3.TitleEnglish: "I'm... A Big Softie When It Comes to These Things"
3.SummaryEnglish: Danblf must make peace with passing himself off as Mira, the pupil of Danblf. Solomon charges Mira with finding all the Nine Wise Men.

4.SummaryEnglish: In her quest to find Soul Howl, one of the Nine Wise Men, Mira continues deeper into the dungeon at Nebrapolis with her newfound friends.

5.SummaryEnglish: Returning to town, Mira and her party finds the place overrun with zombies. And later, Mira runs into another player stuck in the game.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mira and Solomon work on the clues Mira brought back on Soul Howl. They also come across clues hinting at the presence of some of the other Nine Wise Men.

7.SummaryEnglish: Continuing her quest to find Soul Howl, Mira heads to Alcait Academy. There, she finds that the evocation magic she uses to summon spirits is no longer as respected as it once was.

8.SummaryEnglish: Mira, Cleos, and Hinata quest through a dungeon to find the information they need. Mira realizes how heavily her 30-year absence has weighed on some.

9.TitleEnglish: "I Do Not Dislike This Sort of Turn of Events"
9.SummaryEnglish: Still on Soul Howl's trail, Mira comes across a fort that could use some help fighting monsters.

10.SummaryEnglish: Mira heads to the Primal Forest for Solomon's project. Afterwards, she runs into a strangely wary man, who mistakes her for a spirit.

11.TitleEnglish: "Did... None of the Praise Come My Way?"
11.SummaryEnglish: On her way back from the Primal Forest, Mira runs into Cyril, Emella, Flicker, and Zef, who are escorting caravans.

12.SummaryEnglish: Mira, Solomon, and Luminaria must protect the kingdom from the hordes of monsters that have appeared within its borders.
